elements.title: deco mail (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that NTT Docomo was the first cell phone service to utilize deco mail (emoji pictured)?

elements.title: Henry Wilson Hodge (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Henry Wilson Hodge served as the director of military railroads for the American Expeditionary Forces during World War I?

elements.title: considered the Holocaust a unique event (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some have considered the Holocaust a unique event, external to history and beyond human understanding?

elements.title: Leo Hussain (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a reviewer noted that when Leo Hussain conducted Weinberg's Die Passagierin at the Oper Frankfurt, the orchestra excelled in chamber music moments, hard beats and distorted entertainment music?

elements.title: WSWI (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1981 Indiana State University–Evansville received a donation valued at nearly $300,000 in the form of campus radio station WSWI?

elements.title: Hacı Lokman Birlik (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the body of Hacı Lokman Birlik was dragged behind a Turkish police vehicle, justified by the Ministry of the Interior by saying that the police assumed the body had a bomb attached to it?

elements.title: 2022 EuroLeague Playoffs (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 2022 EuroLeague Playoffs marked the first appearance in the event for AS Monaco?

elements.title: Hi-Tek Corporation (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hi-Tek Corporation's 725 series keyboard switches were rated for a lifetime of 100 million keystrokes?
